name: Islamic Theology
description: Also known as The 99 Beautiful Names (Asma al-Husna). Associated with All Creation, All Knowledge, All Power. Known by the epithets: Ar-Rahman (The Compassionate).
divine_attributes:
- Tawhid


Essence
Absolute Unity (Tawhid)


Domains
All Creation, All Knowledge, All Power


Symbols
Crescent Moon, Star, Calligraphy


Sacred Text
Quran (revealed word)


Primary Names
Ar-Rahman (The Compassionate), Ar-Rahim (The Merciful)


Relationship
Creator-Creation, Master-Servant, Closer than jugular vein


The Nature of Allah

Tawhid (absolute monotheism) is the cornerstone of Islamic theology

All of Allah's attributes are perfect and without deficiency
Divine Will: Everything that occurs is by Allah's permission and decree (Qadr)
Mercy Above All: "My mercy encompasses all things" (Quran 7:156)


Verse of Pure Monotheism (Ayat al-Tawhid):
                "Say: He is Allah, the One

Tafsir Ibn Kathir - Classical Quranic commentary

divine_attributes:
& Nature


Nature
Created from Light (Nur)


Primary Role
Bearer of Divine Revelation (Wahy)


Rank
Chief of Angels (Sayyid al-Mala'ika)


Wings
600 Wings (as seen by Muhammad)


Other Names
Ruh al-Qudus (Holy Spirit), Ruh al-Amin (Trustworthy Spirit)


Presence
Appears in Various Forms


The Nature of Jibreel

                Jibreel is the greatest of all angels, standing closest to Allah's throne

title: Prophet
description: Also known as ğŸ•Œ Prophet Muhammad. Associated with unknown.
divine_attributes:
Birth
570 CE, Makkah (Year of the Elephant)


Death
632 CE (aged 63), Madinah


Status
Final Prophet, Seal of Prophethood


Known As
Al-Amin (The Trustworthy), Al-Sadiq (The Truthful)


Family
Father: Abdullah, Mother: Aminah, Wife: Khadijah (first)


Children
Fatimah (daughter), and others


Tribe
Quraysh (Banu Hashim clan)


Revelation Period
610-632 CE (23 years)


Early Life
Birth and Orphanhood

                Muhammad was born in 570 CE during the "Year of the Elephant," when Abraha's army attempted to
                destroy the Kaaba
